pages.text: Bounties are $(l)challenges$() that can be completed in order to receive $(l)Vault Experience$() and $(l)resources$().$(br2)Bounties have 3 states: $(l)Available$(), $(l)Active$() and $(l)Completed$().$(br2)Available Bounties can be initiated using the Bounty Table. Once $(l)completed$(), the $(l)rewards$() can be claimed.

$(l)Completing$() a Bounty will $(l)renew$() it after a small period. $(l)Active$() Bounties can also be abandoned, but trigger an $(l)abandon penalty$().$(br2)Available Bounties can be renewed using $(l)Bounty Pearls$().

pages.title: Legendary Bounties
pages.text: $(l)Lost Bounties$() can be found in $(l)Treasure Sand$() in $(l:the_vault/treasure_rooms)$(l)Treasure Rooms$().$(br2)They can initiate Legendary Bounties by $(l)right-clicking$() on a Bounty Table.$(br2)Legendary Bounties are $(l)separate$() from regular Bounties and can be completed simultaneously.
